learnerProfile.title: Learner Profile Settings
learnerProfile.description: Customize your learning experience by adjusting your preferences.

feedback.title: Feedback Preferences
feedback.description: Choose your preferred style of feedback - from concise to detailed, or from follow-up questions to summaries.

feedbackPracticalTheoretical.title: Practical vs. Theoretical
feedbackPracticalTheoretical.description: Practical feedback focuses on real-world applications and examples, while theoretical feedback emphasizes concepts and principles.

feedbackCreativeGuidance.title: Creative Exploration vs. Focused Guidance
feedbackCreativeGuidance.description: Creative feedback encourages exploration and innovation, while focused guidance provides clear direction and structure.

feedbackFollowupSummary.title: Follow-up Questions vs. Summary
feedbackFollowupSummary.description: Follow-up questions encourage deeper thinking and exploration, while summaries provide a concise overview of the topic.

feedbackBriefDetailed.title: Brief vs. Detailed
feedbackBriefDetailed.description: Brief feedback provides quick insights, while detailed explanations offer more context and background information.
